I am an assistant professor of statistics in the Department of [Advanced Computing Sciences](https://www.maastrichtuniversity.nl/dacs) at Maastricht University, and a principal investigator in the [Center of Experimental Rheumatology](https://www.usz.ch/en/department/rheumatology/research-at-the-clinic-for-rheumatology/research-focus-of-the-clinic-for-rheumatology/research-group-christof-seiler/) at University Hospital Zurich and University of Zurich. I received my academic training at Stanford University, Inria, and University of Bern.
